about_the_game:
Reed Stalks twist and shuffle in the umbral breeze.
A tide brushes gently against an ancient beach, soaking into the endless sand.
The sounds of the Dream Wilds fills your ears and enters your heart's eye.

This is the Original Soundtrack of DREAMWILD.
Featuring all sorts of strange, atmospheric sounds, experience the sound of the Dream Wilds first hand!
